description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. MegaCity is an original and fun 'one-more-go' style city building puzzle game. Easy to learn, hard to master gameplay which requires strategy, logic and luck.  Place buildings in the queue to earn points, but watch out, nobody wants to live next to a landfill or industrial estate! Megacity is a game of planning ahead to squeeze the most points of out your citizens by clever town planning.
